rule.name: AS_FS_ALT_BL_EvaluateEntityRelationshipTrigger
rule.description: Expression rule that evaluates whether a entity relationship trigger condition has been met

el.a:name: action: ADD on newObject with simple add
action: ADD on newObject with no add
action: ADD on newObject with add and delete
action: DEACTIVATE on newObject with simple deactivation
action: DEACTIVATION on newObject with no deactivation
action: DEACTIVATE on newObject with add and deactivate
action: MODIFY, originalObject is under threshold
action: MODIFY, newObject is at threshold
action: MODIFY, one originalObject was above threshold but a different newObject is above threshold
action: MODIFY, one originalObject was above threshold but a different newObject is above threshold (isOriginalObjectEvaluation=true)
action: ADD on newObject with list add
